ing: 4 whole graham crackers, broken into two square halves
des: "You no longer have to have a campfire to eat a good smore! These smores use NutellaÂ® and marshmallow fluff, so there is no cooking involved."
ins: Spread 1 1/2 teaspoons chocolate-hazelnut spread onto 4 of the graham cracker halves. Spread 1 1/2 teaspoons marshmallow cream onto the remaining 4 graham cracker halves. Press 1 chocolate-hazelnut graham cracker half together with 1 marshmallow cream half. Repeat with remaining graham crackers.
